structure.unit: TITLE TO PROPERTY AND RESTRICTIONS ON USE, OWNERSHIP, AND ALIENATION

law.text: The clerk of the court shall administer to the jurors, after they have been selected, the following oath: "Each of you do solemnly swear, that you will impartially, and to the best of your skill and judgment, discharge the duties required of you in the present case, by the provisions of the law concerning occupying claimants."
law.history: Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 304, effective January 2, 1978. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3730.
